title: The 100+ Best Questions to Ask Your BFF

steps.title: Choose some silly questions to liven up any convo with your bestie.
steps.content: Choose some silly questions to liven up any convo with your bestie. In the mood for some giggles? These questions range from amusing to zany to hysterical, all guaranteed to add some hilarity to your hangout. [1] X Research source If you had to eat a crayon from its box, what color would it be? If your doppelganger suddenly appeared, how would you prove to me that you’re the real one? [2] X Research source If you were a chair, who would you like to sit on you? If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why? If someone was filming your life up to this point, what would be on the soundtrack? If you could have any mythical creature as a pet, what would it be? If you were suddenly arrested by the police, what do you think I would assume you’ve done? [3] X Research source Would you rather own a dragon or be a dragon? Would you rather wear shoes every second for the rest of your life or never be allowed to wear shoes ever again? Would you rather fight 1 cow-sized duck or 50 duck-sized cows? Which sport would be funniest if it had mandatory alcohol? [4] X Research source What is the weirdest thing you have seen in someone else’s home? What songs are on your zombie-killing soundtrack? What is the nastiest-sounding word you’ve ever heard in your life? [5] X Research source What conspiracy theories do you believe in? What breakfast cereal has influenced your life the most? When you get dressed, do you put on your socks or pants first? What do you think is the worst ice cream flavor? [6] X Research source What would your life be called if it was a sitcom series? [7] X Research source How many second graders do you think you could fight off before you become overwhelmed?

steps.title: Ask random questions if you're bored or need a conversation starter.
steps.content: Ask random questions if you're bored or need a conversation starter. If you and your bestie are waiting for class to start or have exhausted all your usual topics, have a fun Q&A session. From hypotheticals to open-ended, these questions can open up new topics, trigger memories of stories to share, and start discussions you may have never thought to have with your BFF! [8] X Research source If you could marry any Hollywood star, who would it be? If you were a flavor, what would you be? [9] X Research source If your wardrobe could only be one color, what would it be? [10] X Research source If you could live in any decade, which one would it be? [11] X Research source If you could travel to one of the planets, which planet would you go to? If you could change your name, what would it be? What's your first memory? What were your favorite things to learn about in school? What was your first email address? What's in your purse, tote bag, or backpack right now? What is the best pizza topping combo? What do you like to do that others think is weird? What is your third-favorite planet? What do you do with your shopping cart when you're done with it at the grocery store? [12] X Research source What's your favorite smell? [13] X Research source What is a song you pretend you don’t like because it’s embarrassing to enjoy it? [14] X Research source Which sport do you wish you were really good at? How would you spend your birthday if money was no object? [15] X Research source Could you label every state on a United States map if it wasn't labeled? You just discovered that you’re a distant relative to royalty and now have a royal title. What title would you want, and what country would you want to represent?

steps.title: Use these intriguing questions to spice up your most intimate chats.
steps.content: Use these intriguing questions to spice up your most intimate chats. Talking about the topics closest to someone’s heart is a great way to get closer to them. Dig a little deeper into the way your BFF thinks and acts with these saucy Qs. [16] X Research source What is the dirtiest thought you’ve ever had? What is your most awkward experience with a crush? What is the first thing you’d do if you woke up one day and you were the opposite sex? Who was the worst significant other you ever had, in your opinion? What is the one thing you’d do in bed with someone if you had no inhibitions whatsoever? What would be on the blooper reel of your life? What is the biggest lie you’ve ever told without getting caught? Who have you had a crush on that I wouldn’t have guessed? [17] X Research source Have you ever had a crush on a cartoon character? If so, who? Have you ever been skinny dipping? Is there a limit to what you would do for the right amount of money? If you had to choose between always being naked or having your thoughts appear in bubbles above your head for everyone to read, which would you choose? Do you think you’re a good kisser? What do you like most and least about your own appearance? What's the funniest excuse you've ever used to get out of a date? [18] X Research source Do you think people meet for a reason or by chance? What is the most attractive quality in a romantic partner? Would you take back someone who cheated on you? Would you uproot and relocate your life for someone you love? Would you prefer receiving flowers and gifts or having a candlelit meal?

steps.title: Make a conversation more interesting with thought-provoking questions.
steps.content: Make a conversation more interesting with thought-provoking questions. Whether light-hearted or more serious, your best friend may have to take a moment to think through their response to these questions. You'll definitely get to know them even better than before! [19] X Research source Would you rather time travel to the past or the future? [20] X Research source What’s the most unforgettable meal you’ve had while traveling? [21] X Research source What's your favorite place you've ever visited? What did you love about it? [22] X Research source When you shower, what’s the first thing you wash? [23] X Research source What would you want to know if a crystal ball could tell you the truth about yourself, your life, the future, or anything else? Would you rather be able to play every musical instrument or speak every language fluently? [24] X Research source If you had to remove one color from the world forever, which would it be? [25] X Research source If you only had one of your five senses, which one would you choose? [26] X Research source Where did your name come from? [27] X Research source Did you have a favorite toy or comfort object growing up? What was it? [28] X Research source What is your favorite memory we share together? [29] X Research source What's the last thing you did for the first time? [30] X Research source What do you like to do when you don't feel like doing anything? [31] X Research source If you could pick a day to relive over and over again, what day would it be and why? [32] X Research source How do you define success? [33] X Research source What can you talk about for hours? [34] X Research source If you could have dinner with any three people from history, who would they be? [35] X Research source What is your love language? Do you wish you had a different one? [36] X Research source Are there any cultural histories or legends that resonate deeply with you? [37] X Research source When you can’t sleep at night, what are you usually thinking about? [38] X Research source

steps.title: Dive into these deep topics in your next heart-to-heart.
steps.content: Dive into these deep topics in your next heart-to-heart. Communication and deep questions build closer bonds between us and our loved ones, allowing us to understand what our nearest and dearest are most like at their core. [39] X Research source Pose a few of the following questions to find out what your bestie thinks about real-life topics and scenarios. Do you usually follow your heart or your head? Do you think friends or family are more important? Do you think dreams have a deeper meaning? Do you think people are more naturally good or naturally evil? Is it easy or difficult for you to accept help from people? What title would you give to this chapter of your life? What is the best advice you’ve ever received? What are you proud of but never had an excuse to talk about? [40] X Research source What would you want your last words to be? [41] X Research source What's a question you'd like to answer but no one asks? [42] X Research source What’s your favorite story your grandparents have told you? What legacy do you hope to leave behind after you’re gone? What are you most grateful for in your life? What is more important in life: beauty, power, knowledge, or money? When is the first time you remember being self-conscious about your body? How do you think that moment shaped how you see yourself now? Where do you go when you need inspiration? How do you handle stress or anxiety when it creeps into your life? How do you hope people feel when they’re around you? How do you define beauty in a person or life? How close and warm is your family? Do you feel your childhood was happier than most other people’s? [43] X Research source
